          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Cigány hivatásos képzőművészet</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Gypsy Professional Fine Art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Professionelle Feine Zigeunerkunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Art Fin Professionnel Gitan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Arte Fina Profissional Aciganada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte Fine Professionale Zingaresca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επαγγελματική λεπτή τέχνη τσιγγάνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Arte Fino Profesional Gitano</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A cigány hivatásos képzőművészet kialakulása, jellemzői, jelentős alakjai</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Progress, Characteristics and Main Figures of the Professional Gypsy Fine Art</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">cigány</string>
            <string language="en-US">gipsy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Fortschritt, die Eigenschaften und die 
Hauptabbildungen der professionellen feinen Zigeunerkunst</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le progrès, les caractéristiques et les figures
principales de l'art fin gitan professionnel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O progresso, as características e as figuras 
principais da arte fina aciganada profissional</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il progresso, le caratteristiche e le figure 
principali di arte fine zingaresca professionale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πρόοδος, τα χαρακτηριστικά και οι βασικοί αριθμοί 
της επαγγελματικής λεπτής τέχνης τσιγγάνων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El progreso, las características y las figuras 
principales del arte fino gitano profesional</string>
          </description>
